content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. This is your AI assistant. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your plumbing service?
Thank you, George. Could you please provide the address where you need the plumbing service?
Thanks for that, George. Let me just confirm that your address is within our service area.
Great news, we do cover your area. When would be an ideal time for our plumber to visit you?
Honestly, I'm really busy this month and I don't think I can schedule anything right now.
I understand, George. If youâ€™d like, I can check for any openings next month or keep your details for a future appointment when you have more availability. Would that work for you?
Thanks, but I think I'll just pass for now. Maybe later on. Appreciate your help!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule at this time
